replies.msg:
小弟我而家自學緊簡單statistics, 睇到呢part 唔係好明。
如果我想整一條multiple linear regression, 可以點呢?
例子: Y 可能由3個Factors(X1, X2, X3) 線性影響, 即 Y = b0 + b1(X1) + b2(X2) + b3(X3)。
而我手上同時有一系列X1, X2, X3, 同 Y 實驗數據。

咁我將所有資料入Excel, 再用data analysis --> regression analysis 呢個功能, 去查佢地的p-value, (我假設95% confident lv)出黎結果假如係:
b0,b1,b2,b3
coefficient: 10,20,30,40
p value: 0.08,0.001,0.87,0.03
因為0.87>0.05, 所以要reject b2 係有關聯, 即係條multiple linear formula應該係
Y=10+20(X1)+40(X4)
???
Y=10+20(X1)+40(X3)
好似要睇埋residuals, r square

quote.msg: 好似要睇埋residuals, r square

replies.msg:
R-squared = 愈大愈好?
Residues 即係?

quote.msg: 好似要睇埋residuals, r square

R-squared = 愈大愈好?
Residues 即係?

replies.msg:
Residuals = Y - [b0 + b1(X1) + b2(X2) + b3(X3)]
睇你用咗乜assumption 不過通常都係assume佢地iid N(0, \sigma^2)
即係你fit完個model要check埋standardised residual係咪iid N(0,1)
唔係嘅話就多數代表仲有啲covariate(s)你未capture到

quote.msg: 好似要睇埋residuals, r square

Residues 即係?

replies.msg:
多謝解答
即係你fit完個model要check埋standardised residual係咪iid N(0,1)
<---請問呢part 係Excel 入邊係點做呢?
要再入Y- [10+20(X1)+40(X3) ], 計多次Mean 同 SD ? 再睇下係唔係 (0,1) ?
留名

而我手上同時有一系列X1, X2, X3, 同 Y 實驗數據。

???

replies.msg:
multiple regression有好多問題要諗
其中包括omission variable bias同埋multicollinearity
如果drop左variable可能有問題

特別如果你個model係structural model, 就要諗下係咪真係要drop,

其次，可能x5,6,7獨立睇係statistcally insignificant但可能係joinly statistically significant, 咁就唔可以亂drop, 可以用f-test去test

另外，x2係咪因為少左x4,5,6,7所以你detect唔到同y的relationship? 係既話，你要重新思考個model

同埋要睇x2 residual plot & cprplot, 先可以諗你個model有咩問題

regression model用途唔止係prediction, 仲要去explain coefficient，可以用唔同hypothesis test 去infer究竟啲factor既影響係咪一樣之類。而且有時個model係有interaction effect, 係呢個時候，單純去睇p value唔係太全面。

quote.msg: 好似要睇埋residuals, r square

R-squared = 愈大愈好?
Residues 即係?

replies.msg: 要小心R2係越多parameter就必然越高(i.e. 部份unexplained SSE必然會跣咗落去啲唔關事嘅variable)，所以可以考慮F-test/ANOVA或者adjusted R2，尤其係呢類基本linear regression

replies.msg:
其實如果想compute啲coefficient出黎其實都係好standard咁做㗎姐，將X1 X2 X3同Y寫成Ax=b嘅matrix form，之後再計least square（A’Ax=A’b)
同埋宜家大吧online calculator計出黎根本係一秒搞掂都根本唔洗識計

replies.msg:
Probabilty theory (without measure space)-> Sstatistical inference(mathematical statistics) ->Rregression analysis (hypothesis testing,linear regression, logistic regression,poison regression, generalized linear model)
讀完你就明咩叫做regression
無番一年半載都學唔曬
書名係由first course in probability Ross果本野開始讀
之後讀mathematical statistical (maximum likelihood 果d)
